instructions.en: Continue straight to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Continuer tout droit pour rester sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.he: המשך ישר כדי להישאר על Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Continua dritto per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.nl: Blijf rechtdoor gaan op Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Jedź dalej prosto, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Continue em frente para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-PT: Continue em frente para se manter em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Kör rakt fram och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için düz devam et
instructions.uk: Продовжуйте рух прямо залишаючись на Cool highway (Ref1)
